entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
